ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] New Xegony Bard
ygData.msgSnippet: I ve not experienced summoning.  Is anything able to summon you, over a certain level?  If so, and I keep running away, will it just keep summoning me?
ygData.messageBody:
I've not experienced summoning. Is anything able to summon you, over a
certain level? If so, and I keep running away, will it just keep summoning
me? Assuming, of course, I can run again after the initial summoning...heh.

I don't like that summoning thing...heh. Dangit! I'm supposed to be able
to run away!!! :)

At

-----Original Message-----
From: Mike.Roach@... [mailto:Mike.Roach@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 10, 2001 3:09 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Xegony Bard


Possibly Grimfeather, but its not so much who can catch you above 30 with MM
drums or better, its who can summon you ;-)

-Faras the mostly lurking bard of 52 songs

-----Original Message-----
From: Christopher Sanders [mailto:christopher.sanders@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 10, 2001 2:06 PM
To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Xegony Bard


Heh..had that been Gorenaire, I'd have been dragon food. :)

Hey, I never tried, but, without getting stunned, at level 30 with MM drums,
is there *anything* that can catch me?

At

-----Original Message-----
From: Windleaf Mistsong [mailto:windleaf@...]
Sent: Tuesday, April 10, 2001 2:57 PM
To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Xegony Bard


Check to the right of the "weight" when you right click it and you'll see
that it has a range of 50, meaning you can equip it in your range slot.

---Windleaf

At 02:25 PM 4/10/01 -0400, Christopher Sanders wrote:
>Thanks. :) Right click, and it says primary only. I'll probably be on
>tonight, so I'll just try sticking it in the ranged slot. :)
>
>At
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Windleaf Mistsong [mailto:windleaf@...]
>Sent: Tuesday, April 10, 2001 2:08 PM
>To: eqbards@yahoogroups.com
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] New Xegony Bard
>
>
>Runed Bone Fork can be put in either primary weap or ranged slot.
>Not that great in the primary slot, so best to use in the ranged slot.
> http://eqdb.allakhazam.com/item.html?item=641
<http://eqdb.allakhazam.com/item.html?item=641>
>
>---Windleaf
>
>At 09:41 AM 4/9/01 -0400, you wrote:
> >Hi, I'm Atonal, another Xegony bard. I'm in all lambent still (except
for
> >boots...a guildmate gave me SS boots), course, I'm only 30, creeping up
on
> >31. :) Dalnir's groups are phenomenal xp.
> >
> >Hey Bril, I notice you say your Runed Bone Fork is in your range slot? I
> >have one also, but mine only goes in the primary slot? I'm confused...is
> >there more than one RBF?
> >
> >Atonal
> >
> >-----Original Message-----
> >From: Rebecca Small [mailto:rsmall@...]
> >Sent: Monday, April 09, 2001 9:25 AM
> >To: 'eqbards@yahoogroups.com'
> >Subject: [eqbards] New Xegony Bard
> >
> >
> >Hail Tzeetch! I'm on Xegony too! Brilinnia is my bard's name, although
I've
> >played this game so long I have 2 alternates: Brilinia (wiz) and
Brillinia
> >(cleric). There's several Xegony bards on this list. Glad to have you!
What
> >guild are you in, or are you?
> >Equipment wise, sounds like you need some Hate and HS time. Definitely do
> >the tamborine quest, much easier than camping the sharkdrum! Also, try to
> >get into Vox/Nag raids before it's too late!
> >I am a patchwork bard but here's what I use as of last night:
> >Head: Hammerhead Helm
> >Face: another WW drop here, forgot which one
> >Neck: I forgot the exact name, one of those things off the WW dragons
that
> >have awesome stats.
> >Chest: Imbrued
> >Arms: SS (had kylong til last weekend, Neero felt sorry for me!)
> >Wrists: kylong and hero
> >Hands: SS
> >Waist: sash of the dragonborn
> >Legs: kylong (but I put in an order for some out of WW last night!)
> >
> >Feet: Imbrued
> >Primary: rare dagger off seb jugs (I'm at work, can't look at equip.)
> >Secondary: martune rapier
> >Range: Runed bone fork
> >Sharkskin drum, gypsy lute, horn
> >
> >I hate Karnors. Seems to be full of idiots everytime I zone in and I need
>to
> >go camp the warlord for the skull for the epic! Blah!
> >
> >Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe (yellow and a half to 56, that means about a month?)
> >Excalibur, Xegony
